name: 1st Prize Bully Helps Baldi Android Mod

description:
Install instructions

How to Install: "Assembly-CSharp.dll" Only ZArchiver App

Open and View .apk File

Go: assets/data/bin/managed/HERE

Tap "+" Button and Add File Button

Go: Download Folder

Tap File Logo and Compression Level

Select "Fastest"

Tap "ADD" Button

Now Install a .apk File
